DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) effective reduce pain subject chronic pelvic pain . Our hypothesis tDCS decrease pain significantly compare sham stimulation .
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Direct Stimulation Chronic Pelvic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The study encompass two experiment : The first one involve patient chronic pain , receive 10 session stimulation , active sham ( parallel design ) . The second experiment involve involve healthy subject , receive active sham tDCS primary motor cortex ( crossover design ) .
